Products.prod_description:
Our story

This pendant features a unique design of a fish and a heart intertwined together. The fish is crafted in fine gold, its fins and tail curled gracefully. The heart has a smaller heart inside of it, both studded with CZ stones.

Your Style Statement

The fish represents freedom, and the heart represents love. This piece is the representation of the connection between freedom and love. The pendant comes with a delicate gold chain, making it the perfect accessory for any occasion. As a symbol of love, freedom, and unity, this pendant is sure to be a treasured piece for years to come.

Our story

We don’t really need to say much about this piece. Lord Krishna’s beauty speaks for itself. Jai Shree Krishna!

Your Style Statement

The chain set is the perfect accessory for those who want to pay homage to Lord Krishna and his divine music. The chain set is not only a symbol of devotion but also a fashion statement. It can be worn on any occasion, formal or informal, and adds a touch of spirituality to one's outfit.

Our Story

This chain set features two birds perched on a heart. The two birds, finished in high polish 18kt gold, symbolise love and companionship, making this pendant a perfect representation of the bond between two people.

Your Style Statement

The chain set comes with a delicate gold chain, making it the perfect accessory for those who appreciate the beauty of nature and the meaningful symbolism it represents. The piece is unique and elegant, a perfect representation of love and harmony.

Our story

This chain set features a beautifully crafted flute made of 18kt gold. The flute is the instrument played by Lord Krishna himself. Alongside the flute, there is a nakshatra symbol, representing the connection between music and the stars. This piece perfectly shows the connection between music and the divinity of Lord Krishna. Jai Shree Krishna!!

Your Style Statement

The pendant captures the essence of divine music and devotion. The pendant is perfect for those who want to keep the spirit of Lord Krishna close to their heart. It's also a great way to show your love for the Indian culture.

Our story

This chain set is a representation of an angel, crafted with intricate details in 18kt gold. The angel is depicted with butterfly-like wings, each wing delicately encrusted with sparkling stones. The body of the angel is made from gold with a high polish finish.

Your Style Statement

The chain set hangs from a delicate gold chain, making it the perfect accessory to add a touch of ethereal beauty to any outfit. The chain set is a representation of beauty, freedom, and grace, symbolising the wearer's own journey towards enlightenment and personal growth.

Our Story

 

You can’t really go wrong with a solitaire ;)

 

Your Style Statement

 

A solitaire is meant to be effortless and elegant. This ring is just that.

Our Story

 

The ring has a simple gold band with a large CZ stone and three studded branches of leaves emerging from the centre.

 

Your Style Statement

 

This little ring is delicate yet unique. You can use it as an individual piece or a stack ring. There is beauty in its simplicity. The design is simple yet striking. This ring can be paired with any outfit, whether formal or casual, to add a touch of elegance and luxury to any look.

Our Story

 

The ring is crafted from 18k gold and features a thin band with a delicate butterfly detail on one side. The butterfly is intricately crafted and sits on top of a CZ studded flower.

 

Your Style Statement

 

Butterflies are self-propelled flowers. A butterfly is proof that you can go through a great transformation and still be beautiful. Take time and be beautiful. Be a butterfly ????

Our Story

 

The ring is crafted from 18k gold and features a two toned sun-shaped design that is beautifully detailed. The sun is adorned with a sparkling cubic zirconia (CZ) stones in the centre that adds a touch of sparkle to the ring.

 

Your Style Statement

 

It is a stunning piece of jewellery that symbolises energy, warmth and light, it's perfect for anyone who appreciates the warmth of the sun.??

Our Story

 

The gold band wraps beautifully around a finger, with butterflies on both sides and two flowers in the centre.

 

Your Style Statement

 

Your wings already exist. All you have to do is fly ????

Our story

This Palm Tree Beach bracelet is a one-of-a-kind creation that brings the tropical vibe to your wrist. The 18k gold band is adorned with an intricately crafted palm tree design. The Palm tree is set in such a way that it gives the impression of it swaying in the breeze.

Your Style Statement

The adjustable band ensures a comfortable fit for most wrist sizes and can be worn on any occasion, whether it is casual or formal. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add a hint of a tropical paradise to their everyday look.

Our story

This botanical bracelet is a one-of-a-kind creation that showcases the beauty of nature. The 18k gold band is adorned with intricate designs of leaves, each one masterfully crafted with a realistic approach. The leaves are arranged in such a way that it gives the impression of movement and life.

Your Style Statement

Everyone must take time to sit and watch the leaves change. This bracelet is perfect for anyone who loves nature and wants to add this beautiful piece to their collection. The adjustable band ensures a comfortable fit for most wrist sizes and can be worn on any occasion, whether it be casual or formal.

Our Story

This unique and elegant bracelet features a flock of birds in flight, masterfully crafted from 18k gold. The three birds are delicately detailed and each one is set with sparkling cubic zirconia (CZ) stones. The birds are arranged in a dynamic and fluid composition that gives the impression of movement and freedom.

Your Style Statement

The design of the bracelet is perfect for those who appreciate nature and symbolism. The birds flying symbolises freedom and the feeling of not being held down. The adjustable gold band ensures a comfortable fit for most wrist sizes, making it perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.

Our story

The bracelet features an intricate bird design, crafted with a realistic approach and with its wings spread wide, as if it's in flight. The body of the bird is made up of CZ stones which gives the bird its glitter and shine.

Your Style Statement

Like a bird, spread your wings and fly as high as you can. The design of the bracelet is bold and striking, perfect for those who appreciate bold jewellery. The adjustable band ensures a comfortable fit for most wrist sizes. This bracelet can be worn on any occasion, whether it be casual or formal, it will add a touch of elegance to any outfit.

Our story

This dolphin bracelet is a unique and elegant piece of jewellery that combines the grace and beauty of dolphins with the luxury of 18k gold. The bracelet features an intricately detailed dolphin design, crafted with a realistic approach, and adorned with small cubic zirconia (CZ) stones. The dolphin sits on the band, as if it's swimming in the sea.

Your Style Statement

The dolphin represents a sense of playfulness and curiosity. Let this bracelet drive that curiosity within you. You can also use that curiosity and playfulness to try to this bracelet with any of your everyday outfits you may have in mind ;). It's perfect for anyone who loves the ocean and wants to add this piece to their jewelry collection.

Our Story

The pendant is crafted from 18k gold and features a delicate bell shape with a small but intricate flower at the bottom. The bell is adorned with small cubic zirconia (CZ) stones that add a touch of sparkle and gives the impression of a bell chime. The flower is adorned with a single CZ stone that shines like a dewdrop.

Your Style Statement

You can wear this pendant on any occasion, to have that elegant as well as luxurious look. It goes best with a long dress or gown, for weddings or parties, and gives you that extra bit of shine.

Our Story

The pendant is crafted from 18k gold and features a key with a delicate heart shape on top. The heart is adorned with small cubic zirconia (CZ) stones that add a touch of sparkle, and the key is topped up with an intricate crown like structure.

Your Style Statement

The combination of the heart shape and the key creates a unique design, making it perfect for anyone who wants to add a touch of love and mystery to their jewellery collection. It could be a perfect gift for a loved one, representing the key to their heart.

Our Story

The pendant is crafted from 18k gold and features a delicate infinity symbol with two hearts. The infinity symbol gives the impression of continuity and timelessness, while the hearts, adorned with small cubic zirconia (CZ) stones, are playfully placed to add a touch of sparkle.

Your Style Statement

This Infinity Pendant is a unique and elegant piece of jewellery that combines the timeless symbol of infinity with the beauty of love. It could be a perfect gift for a loved one, representing infinite love and commitment.

Our story

This pendant features a triangle shape made of gold, with a heart nestled inside. The lines of the triangle are sleek and modern, while the heart adds a touch of elegance and romance. The heart is studded with small sparkling stones that catch the light, adding a touch of sparkle to the piece.

Your Style Statement

The triangle represents the three aspects of the self - mind, body, and spirit - and the heart inside it represents love and compassion. Wearing this pendant is a reminder to find balance within oneself and to nurture love and compassion for others.

Our story

This pendant features a unique and intricate design, with three tails made of gold, ending with a sparkling heart-shaped stone. The tails are delicately crafted to flow seamlessly into the heart, creating a sense of movement and fluidity.

Your Style Statement

The three tails represent the past, present, and future and the heart shape symbolises love and affection. This pendant is perfect for anyone who loves unique and meaningful jewellery.

collections.description: Experience the Joy of Fluttering with Our Butterfly Collection
Unlock the language of love with our exquisite Heart Collection, crafted to express your deepest emotions
Step into a world of natural beauty with our exquisite Flora collection
